title: It’s actually ridiculous
body: I don’t know how many times I’ve been knocked out of a series or BANNED because the game decides then would be a mighty fine time to completely disconnect me from the game then tell me there might be a problem with the NA server, even though I JUST DCED FROM A MATCH.

replies.body:
This account doesn't seem banned or punished right now, but you shouldn't have gotten and LPQ unless the system noticed a trend of leaves and you definitely shouldn't get *banned* from playing. It sounds like you may need to take a step back from matchmade games and try some quick troubleshooting steps to try and stop this from happening so often. 

I don't want you getting any long LPQ's or anything due to something you can't fully prevent, but do me a favor and take some preventative steps by going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). They can help make sure you have a stable link to our servers so that shouldn't happen so often.
